techmeme.title: OpenAI says users who tested GPT-4.5 found it to be a natural conversationalist, with the ability to convey warmth and display a kind of emotional intelligence (Igor Bonifacic/Engadget)
OpenAI's GPT-4.5 System Card says the model is highly persuasive and excelled at convincing GPT-4o into "donating" virtual money (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
OpenAI launches GPT-4.5, its "largest and most knowledgeable model" as a research preview, says it's not a frontier model and performance is "below o1, o3-mini" (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Amazon CEO Andy Jassy says a proposed Biden-era rule to curb the export of AI chips to nations like Israel and the UAE could have unintended consequences (Bloomberg)
Meta says it has fired "roughly 20" employees who leaked "confidential information outside the company" and expects "there will be more" (Alex Heath/The Verge)
